ComicInfo.Title: The Monsters Are Coming; Sir Lucifer Attacks; The Sport of Bdula Khan; Case of the Sinking Subs [The Saboteurs]; The Vacuumites; Dr. Martinious, Warlord of Mars; The Man Who Hated the World
ComicInfo.Summary:
Yank Wilson stops a spy ring that was responsible for sinking United States submarines.
Space Smith and Dianna are taken prisoner by the Vacuumites, mummified inhabitants of the vacuum meteor.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:10:18. [Issue ID 781]
